msDesc.p: A scribe from Bikaner, hired by me in 1984--85, made a useful hand copy of the text, which is now in the library of the Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine, in London and in my personal possession. It covers the text followed by a \emph{vyākhyāna}.

Leaves 1--78, written on one side only of machine made foolscap paper. 25 lines\slash page, 27 akṣaras\slash line of modern Devanāgarī handwriting, using ballpoint pen. Most verses unnumbered. Corrections throughout in red ballpoint. Pages 35, 36 in a different hand.

lg.l: athāto vajrādau lohamāraṇaṃ drāvaṇādhikāraṃ prathamaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ|
meṣaśraṃśaṃ ttu bhujaṃ gāsthi kūrmapiṣṭaṃ śilājatu
vajraṃ kaṃ vāpi vaikrāntaṃ tanmadhye nikṣiped budhaḥ|
jalaṃ bhāṃdeva tāsthintaṃ samāho dravatāṃ vrajet|
ete kaṣāpai sadhūmalabdha vetasām, \linenum \dag \dag sovīrakaṃ svedasamastadhātavo|
grahadhūmaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ saṃpuktaṃ punareva vā|
tāpyaṃ muṃcati sattvaṃ rasakaṃ ca trisaṃdhāte
vimalasattvaṃ = varadaṃ pātanāyaṃtre pātitaṃ ca jalāśaye|
tenākhyātaṃ mayā sattvaṃ rasendrasya samaṃ yataḥ|
goṣṭhe dharaṇīgatamāsaṃ paśusalilaṃ bahuśaḥ bhāvitaṃ kapitiṃduka-
vidhānena kā?inī guṃjāphalānāṃ samasṛṇaṃ kṛtacurṇaṃ ambaraṃ
gaganaṃ so vacalācitaṃ pakṣaṃ hi śarāvapuṭe bahuvīraṃ bhavati|
aragalālābhiḥ kṛtarivāyaṃ kanakaṃ tiṣṭhati ruciraṃ yathā toyaṃ
nijarasaṃ bahuparimāvitaṃ suradāli cūrṇadattaḥ prativāpaḥ dravati|
na saṃsthā--nipuṇaḥ kanakaṃ bahuśo.api kālena śākhā-
dattvā tai tva balvatale sumarditadṛḍhaṃ nirguḍīmuṃḍīrase,
pitraṃ haṃti ca pitṛsaṃbhava gādan sarvān vai pittajvaśān,
kāśaśvāsa galābhayā kṣayatṛṣā dāghaśca śoṣaṃ bhṛśaṃ|
nāmnā tīkṣṇamukhaṃ rasendramamalaṃ śrīnātha budhau budhaiḥ||
dhṛṣṭ{}vā baddhavalīṭa haṃti sahasā\dag \dag śleṣmācitaṃ mārutam||
kṛtvā parpaka draveṇa bhatimān bhāṭāni haṃti bhṛśam\dag \dag ,
vṛkṣe candranipāta- maṃdiramidaṃ pittaṃ ca śleṣmācitaṃ||
madhukasya rasena śoṣitamidaṃ nasye prapāne matā|
kṛtvā tri netrayugāṃ janaṃ ca vidhinā tatsaṃnipātaṃ jayet|
dvau bhāgau gaṃdhakasyaika trīn bhāgān kaṭutrayaṃ|
vahniṃ? dattva tu bhāgaikaṃ kāṣṭamāga- samanvitaṃ|
kṛtvā gaṃdhakapiṣṭakāṃ ca gaganaṃ tāpāruhoḍaṃbaram\dag \dag , kāṃtaṃ bhrāmakacūrṇakaṃ sūtakasamaṃ vaikrāntatālānvitam|
hemaṃ tu ṣoḍaśāṃsena vārito.api yadā rasaḥ|
kāṃtaṃ gaṃdhakasahitaṃ sūtevārṇaṃ ca taṃ kṛtam|
bhasma mūkhāyaṃtre nihitaṃ sākṣāt yakṣma nihaṃtyāśu
ravetaṃ patiṃ tathā raktaṃ rathāmaṃ kr\dag s\dag n\dag aṃ ca caturdaśam|
naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca aṃdhamūkhāṃ nidhāpayet|
te ca saptavidhā proktā karme tasyāpyanekadhā||
sunirvaṇaṃ tato jñātvā pale palaśataṃ kṣipet|
tāre tu jāyate bhasma viśuddhā sphaṭikākṛtiḥ||
bhasmaṃ tu jāyate sarvaṃ śuddhahemaprabhaṃ sabhaṃ|
tad bhasma rasendra tu punarardhena melayet|
pītaṃ tu hemakārī syāt\dag \dag \dag vyāghrī--kaṃdena śveditam|
tato svinnaṃ ca vaikrāntaṃ bhāgamekaṃ samāharet|
tad dravaṃ śuddhasūtaṃ tu madhunā saha marditam|
tena bhasva- samaṃ sūtaṃ baṃdhamāyāti nā.anyathā|
vaikrāntasya palaṃ hyekaṃ hemna?ścaiva palaṃ tathā|
pāradasya? pale ve? nu khalve saṃsthāpya yatnataḥ|
atha vā dvau mahoṣadhau kaṭutuvyottara vāruṇā|
naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ ca śuṣṭaṃ ca aṃdhamūkhāṃ nidhāpayet|
karṣaṃ tuṣāgninā bhāmau mṛdu svedena svedayet|
ahorātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhasmaṃ bhavati śobhanam|
sarvaṃ taṃ bhakṣayet yāvat ajarāmaratāṃ labhet||
makhāṃ mṛnm?ayāṃ kṛtvā sudṛḍhāṃ varttulāṃ kārayed budhaḥ|
sulakṣṇe peṣayitvā tu toyaṃ dattvā punaḥ punaḥ|
ahorātraṃ trirātraṃ vā rasendro bhasmatāṃ vrajet||
bhojanaṃ cāpi kurvīta payasā ṣaṣṭi kodanam|
na krodho na ca vai ciṃtā na karttavyā sadā budhaiḥ|
guṣkaṃ tu golakaṃ kṛtvā aṃdhamūkhāṃ nidhāpayet|
tāṃ ca guṣkaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tuṣa--karṣāgninā puṭam|
ekarātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhasmaṃ bhavati śobhanam|
śuddhaṃ rasaṃ goṇika- yāranāle saṃmardya khalve kṛtanaṣṭapiṣṭaṃ,
samānagaṃdhena ca patramadhye bhasmaṃ bhavet pātanayaṃtrayogāt|
tatkhalvamukhena ca ṭaṃkanena sa nāgarāmāgadhikā yutena||
go māyātita devasūtaṃ saṃkocanāmeti jane prasiddhaṃ|
kṛtvā kajjalakāmādau palaṃ dattvā ca gaṃdhakam|
brahmī vārā rudantī bhunivaramaparo brahmavṛkṣasya sāram||
paścātsarva--viśuddhaṃ ca sapramāṇa dviguṇaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ kṛtvā
tat--sthiti sūte vahnisthe lohapātre ca vigalitagātre
kṣiptvā samuttīrya sūryaprabho nāma rasaḥ puṇḍarīkakaṣṭaharaḥ|
pūrvvaṃ? yāni viśodhitāni puṭake kāṃtāmra--sulvāni ca \dag \dag \dag,
pratyekaṃ suhare ca gaṃdhakasamānyetāni kṛtvā tataḥ|
taccūrṇaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ ca sādhitarasaṃ caitākrameṇa bhiṣak,
ca mūṃsalī muṃḍīkā tathā śatāvarī paṃcapacaite kvāthaḥ
bṛhatī ca vasaṃtadūtī vyāghrī ceṭeṃbu vāruṇī|
tato yāvadastamanaṃ pākā.avasānasamaye jñātvā tatraiva citrakaṃ|
prakṣipya samānena guḍapāna samānena va vahnistha--mahauṣadhaṃ
guṃjāyugmaṃ pramāṇena tato bad{}dhvā dṛḍhaṃ vaṭī|
dviguṇaṃ sūtakāṃ tatra daśāṃśe kyaṣuṣaṃ viṣam|
ekaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ mardya śatamūlī--rasena ca|
ekatra mardayitvā tu tena sarva pralepayet|
kṣāraṃ ca ṭakaṇam kṣāraṃ sulvacūrṇaṃ tu sūtakam|
tato bhṛtya--prayatnena yathā na vrajate rasaḥ||
samabh?āgāni vaitāni pacyā ca triguṇā viṣe|
madhunā mardayitvā tu guṭikā vā?rayed bhiṣak||
jñātvā balābalaṃ sattvaṃ dve vā dāp?ayet punaḥ||
athavā guṣṭikā sārdhā pathyārogā na pīḍ{}yate|
anye te vātajāḥ kuṣṭāstān sarvān vyapohati|
ghanasya piṣṭikā vāryā sulvasyāpya ghavā tudh?aḥ|
sam?a?gāni caitāni pathyāḥ ca triguṇā bhaved|
sabale dve pradātavyā kṣīṇe cārddhā pradāpayet|
kaumārī dravamarditaṃ suvidhinā pakvaṃ tu tuṣāgnau puṭe|
vyādhi suvarṣā bhūve nāginy?o rasaghananādajena matimān kṛtvā punargolakam,
taṃ pakvaṃ vacararāmena sahasā yatnena taṃ vālo jalayā vaśyam?
ghṛṣṭaṃ tuṃgarasena vetasayutaṃ tat pāṃd?u gegāpaham|
saṃkoca tasmasūtakaṃ pāṃduroge devadālīrase ghṛṣṭāṃ mu?nasulvasya
pīṣṭikāṃ gaṃdhāśma cūrṇa saṃyuktāmatyugrāṃ v?āmalāṃ jayet|
yuktayā tāṃ tāmrapātreṇa hi paṃcavidhāṃ jayet|
gaṃdhakapiṣṭikā hikkāsvāso amrakaṃ haravīryaṃ ca tīkṣṇasulvaṃ|
ta samaṃ amrakaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ sat{}viṣaṃ
ekīkṛtvā tu saṃmardya daśāṃśe śamyupakaṃ viṣam|
kṛtvā tu golakaṃ śuddhaṃ pācitaṃ gaṃdhamahayataḥ|
rājāvarttaṃ rajaḥ sulvaṃ sūte garbhā niyojayet|
tālaṃ ca tāpyaṃ caritaṃ ca rasendram|
sulvaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ kṛtvā khalve dattvā dina--trayaṃ|
aprasūtā gavāṃ sūtre mardayitvā tataḥ puṭe|
dinaṃ yāvat sarppeta śarkarā madhu yojayet|
īṣat karpūrasaṃ yuktaṃ daśāṃśe śakyu phaṃviṣaṃ|
valā: nāgavalā kṛṣṇā mālayātyā pārthivaiḥ rasaiḥ|
payas?ā ca varttiḥ chāyā pramuṣkīnayanā mayān jayet|
rasanāśayet timiraṃ kāvaṃ paḍalaṃ arbuda tathā|
adhikāni tu māsāṃ siyasudūraṃ na paśyati|
timarevardanaṃ taraṇi pratāpo nāma rasaḥ vadanāmayaharaḥ|
gaṃdhe vā tābhratāre vā kṛtvādau bhasmasūtakam|
tāmre same samaṃ sūte vīrṇaṃ yuktyā prayojitam|
iti śrīmannāgārjune viracite rasendramaṃgale bhasma-sūtaka nāma tṛtīyo.adhyāyaḥ|
pūrvaṃ yanmāritaṃ sūtaṃ vajīṃ dravī anekadhā|
naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ ca guṣkaṃ ca aṃghrayitvā puṭe tataḥ|
khoṭaṃ tu bhavate divyaṃ śatavedhi mahārasaḥ|
triguṇena tu sūtena saṃkalā dvitīyā matā|
ṣaḍguṇena tu sūtena saṃkalā dvitīyā matā|
ṣaḍuṇena tu sūtena saṃkalā tṛtīyā matā|
tṛ?tīye sah?a suvedhī ca caturthe yutameva ca|
paṃcame lakṣavedhī ca daśalakṣaṃ tu ṣaṣṭake|
yathā lohe tathā dehe kramate nātra saṃśayaḥ|
kārayet guṭikā dāvyā vajrasiddhe na kāṃcane|
pūjayitvā yathā nyāyaṃ kālī--devīṃ ca bhiravam|
vaktra--madhye tu sā dvidhā guṭikā divyarūpiṇī|
tatpramāṇe tu baddhā vai śatādyā rāṣṭravedhikā|
naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ tu ṣuṣkaṃ ca aṃdhre dattvā sudhāpayet|
ṣoṭaṃ tu jāyate divyaṃ śatavedhī mahārasaḥ|
pūrvokta phaladaḥ prokto sūtako nātra saṃśayaḥ|
vaktrasthā bahukāle vijayati viśvaṃ na saṃdehaḥ|
nasaṃ khalve saṃmarddayitvā tu trilohena vaveṣṭavet|
kaṃṭhe baddhā tathā dṛśyo yojanānāṃ śataṃ vrajet|
ca sunakaṃ candraṃ rasavi tāṃḍavaṃ kāṃtatīkṣṇasurāyasaṃ
mṛtadṛḍhaṃ sūtaṃ kṛtaṃ tatsamaṃ vaktrasthaṃ rasagolakaṃ|
sarvaṃ rasuddhaṃ rasaṃ grāhyaṃ pādāṃśe hemajāritam|
vidhinā mardayitvā tu naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ tu kārayet|
vaktrasthā nāśayet sākṣāt palitaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ|
strīrajo siddhaṃ kena punarveṣṭya guhya--sthāne nidhāpayet|
raṇe rājakule yuk?e dāvye kāme jayo bhavet|
śuddhaṃ ca sūtake caiva vajrabhasmameva ca|
vaikrāntābhāk? kāṃtaṃ tu samyak tu surāyasaṃ|
samāvartta tataḥ sūte yo jayet pādayorgataḥ|
samaṃ tu jāyate sūte sārayitvā samena tu|
sahasravedhā sa ceṭ sākṣāt sarvaloheṣu niścitam??|
śvetā pitā tathā kṛṣṇā capalā syuḥ caturviddhā??|
kramayogena vai teṣāṃ rasabṃdhaṃ tu jāyate||
naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ tu taṃ kṛtvā aṃdhamūkhāgataṃ dhamet||
tatrasthaṃ ca rasendraṃ tu ṣoṭaṃ bhavati śobhanam|
tena sutvaśatāṃśena tār?aṃ viddhaṃ ca kāṃcanam|
yathā loho tathā dehe nānyathā jāyate kvacit|
aṣṭau bhāgāśca hemnaśca mūlasya nava rūpayet||
trir?āmā tu bhavet sarvaiḥ kartavyā ca vicakṣṇaiḥ|
adhamūkhāṃ dhamet tatra ṣoṭaṃ bhavati śobhanam||
tena nāgena sutvaṃ tu viddhaṃ guṃjāruṇaṃ bhavet||
tena sutvena tāraṃ tu hemaṃ bhavati śobhanam|
kramaṃ jñātvā prayatnena badhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ|
bījaṃ sūtaṃ ca vaikrāntaṃ mardayet praharadvayam|
śuṣkaṃ tu gola?aṃ kṛtvā aṃdhamūkhāṃ nidhāpayet||
chāyāśuṣkaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā puṭaṃ karṣaṃ tuṣāgninā|
raṃbhā vīrā suhī kṣīraṃ kaṃcukī ca vidārikā|
nārī nārīva gau raṃbhā mīnākṣī kāvamāvikā||
ebhiḥ sumarditaḥ sūtaḥ punarjanma na vidyate|
vakrāṃkā viṣṇukāṃtā ca balā ca tulasī tathā|
ebhiḥ sumarditaḥ sūtaḥ punaḥ janma na vidyate|
snuhākṣīraṃ ca kān{}jīraṃ kaṃcukīva rasaṃ tathā|
hemasame samaṃ sūtaṃ pīṭhikāṃ kkrayed budhaḥ|
hemasame samaṃ sūtaṃ pīṭhikāṃ kārayed budhaḥ|
athavā tārapiṣṭaṃ ca kārayitvā same samaṃ|
laghupuṭaṃ tato dattvā tataḥ siddhati sūtakaḥ|
kāṃjīrabījaṃ surasārasaṃ ca sa ārdrapiṃḍa? rajanīyutam|
halottamākhyaṃ kuhaḍaṃ vivarjya etaistu sūtaṃ dṛḍhapakṣahedaḥ||
hemnaḥ same samaṃ sūtaṃ piṣṭikāṃ kārayed budhaḥ|
tato mākṣika satvaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ tadanantaram|
garbhe drāvayitvā tu tato vāḍ{}yāṃ duti d?adet|
anena krameṇaiva yā tu kh?oṭākṛti bhavet|
guṭikāyāḥ sarvabaṃdheṣu tat ṣoṭaṃ yojayed budhaḥ|
dīvyauṣadhān tato dattvā puṭe karṣaṃ tuṣāgninā|
tato dhṛtya prayatnena haṭhagnau dhāmayed rasam|
ṣoṭaṃ vai jāyate divyaṃ taruṣādhṛtya sall?ibhaṃ|
tato.api ṭaṃkaṇaṃ kācaṃ dattvā dattvā tu śodhayet|
kh?ete tu khetadravyeṇa raktaṃ raktai su niraṃjanam|
abhrakājāraṇamādau garbhadyuti jāraṇaṃ ca bījāṃte yo jānāti sa vādī|

lg.l: abhrakaṃ grasate śīghraṃ anyathā- nagni saṃgamam|
mākṣikaṃ va viṣaṃ guṃjā ṭaṃkaṇaṃ strīrajastathā|
strīstanyaṃ va liptaṃ tu sarva dvaṃdvānumelanam|
jīvaṃ jīvaṃ hi vyoṣayāṣāṇai kroṣṭajiṣkāsu bhāvitam|
raṃjate viṃdhate sūtaḥ kramatevaṃ na saṃśayaḥ|
eteṣāṃ drāveṇa sarve jāyate ca rasena tu||
krāmaṇena ca mūkhāyāṃ lepaṃ dattvā vicakṣaṇaḥ|
kaṣaiḥ tuṣāgninā bhūme svedena milate kṣ.anāt|
sahasravedhī bhavet sūno nātra kāryā vicāraṇā|
hemasthāne dadet tāṭaṃ tāṭaṃ karmaṇi ś?asyate|
nāgaṃ tu prativāsena śatāṃse sthaṃbhayet kravam|
śleṣmāṃta phalaṃ caiva pakvaṃ śrīphalasya ca|
yojyā kāmakāle tu kāmayet kāminī svayam|
kuryāt śaśireṣ?ā ṣa?kaṇī kokilākhyāyā mārgakanakānāṃ cūrṇaiḥ|
niśāyāṃ kāṃjikaṃ pūpaṃ dattvā yonau praveśayet|
nīrase nāvināṃ bhrāṇaṃ ye teṣāṃ ratisaṃgamonmattāni kālāni|
rasabhāgaṃ caturthaṃ tu vaṃga bhāgaṃ tu paṃcamam|
tridinaṃ mardayitvā tu golakaṃ ca rasod{}bhavam|
dviguṇaṃ munikanakanāgasarppā jātyā satī vyoṣa tanmardya
drākena mardayetvā gaṇiryā madanavalayaṃ kṛtvā rati-
ca kanakapatrāṇi kapi ka ttu vajravallamla--pippalikāmaṃ
dravyaiḥ smaravalayaṃ kṛtyevaṃ vanitānāṃ drāvaṇaṃ paramaṃ
pāṇigatāṃ rati--sevane kāle staṃbhan vīryaṃ narasya citram|
taiḥ kalkaiḥ viniravāyateti nivaḍaṃ liṃgaṃ svakaṃ lepayet|
sthitvā yāma yathādhunā dhvajavaraṃ prakṣālayettaṃ tataḥ|
yaṃtre salilayogena ādāya nip?uṇabuddhiḥ pādāṃśena jāraye|
ṣaḍguṇaṃ jārayitvā tu tataḥ kṛtvā tu jāraṇāt|
tato dhṛty?a prayatnena pakvabījaṃ tu kārayet|
bahuśaḥ lavaṇāni samastāni jarati vidhinā marditasūtavidraṃ
samaṃ jaraye yāvat sālinihalinirasena vimardya samayamāret?
rasaṃ mūsigataṃ gomaya- vipakvaṃ tad{}vasaṃ dhautamākṣikam|
dvau bhāgau tasya śulvasya ekaṃ tārasya gālayet|
sarvāṃ tena tu pakvaṃ tāraṃ bhavati
tad{}vadena kanakaṃ sulvamapi pakameli hemasamaṃ vāhnyet|
tadutkarṣaṃ tārasame? na tu puṣṭista bhavati|
tadarddhena kalyāṇaṃ śṛṃgī ṭaṃkaṇaguṃjābhirmukhā lepaṃ tu kārayet|
pūrvamudiṣṭaṃ ratkagaṇeṣu varāgo taireva kāyed bījaṃ
kiṃ na samena samaṃ vā kuryādvā vāyaṃ duptena tu mākṣike|
dravati hi garuRa śatāṃśena vaṃgābhrakena śuddhaṃ ravidinasaṃkhyātra
kanakarajaṃ vā bhayati viṃśati v?ījaṃ tatrāralepanāt
sūtaṃ viṃśatimena tu garuḍaṃ tārākāśitakeviddhaṃ aruṇa-
ji?narajanā?dīnanāṃ bhāgan yugapaṃca ṣaṭ{}sama ekīkṛtya sameleṣā
kanakaṃ sūtaṃ dvādaśa kuṭījvavedhā paṃcamavedhena bhavati|
ṣoḍaśenena tu viṃdhati rasendraḥ pratisāraṇayuktaḥ pāṭalijaḥ
tato jaṃbīrajāraṇaṃ sarvadhātuṣu viḍ{}vargaḥ guḍaki evaṣṭaka
vā hastatalena hi golakamāhurbali vasākhaṃgābhrādīn pālu-
vetasanṛpa--varjrakaśulkapāradena samaṃ kuryādetasvedaṃ piṃḍī bhavati na vātra saṃdehaḥ|
sūtadyana baṃga alpaṃ raṃbhābījaṃ ca m?aśvavaṃgābhraṃ vaṃganiṣevitakāṃjikaṃ ca pītoparasādikaṃ varati|
kuru bodhisattvaṃ bījaṃ siddhirasyāṃ tu karttavyā syu
mā samutkarṣaṃ sahadevāṃ varakāmini viṭaviṣopālaiḥ krāmayaṃti
rasaṃ utkarṣaṇa--krāmaṇavargaṃ va āyasamyak dhātu triguṇena
tu rajayennākharaṃ tutthādānāṃ punarapi tāraṃ jāṃtūnadaṃ bhavati|
bahuśaḥ arthavikṣārai lopādraviriṃdutāṃ yāti tārākṛṣṭiḥ gopiśin
daśeṃduthāpenbato yogaḥ tāraṃ raṃjanaṃ jalajārabaddhapaṭalāt patati
pāyasā kuṭukaṃ dhṛṣṭ{}vā nasya dadyā rasasya ca|
varṣaśatānāṃ samūhamapi idamatra param guhyaṃ kṛtvā divedhārddha
bhūmi khanitvā taṃ māsaṃ sthāpaya vidvaṃ tāḍanadahanakarttavyam|
dātavyamihārth?ike svadehamapi mātṛkayā viddhaṃ nā gopaye|
prārthito dadheta śīghraṃ yasya yasya hi|
yādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭ{}vā vyāgaṃ bhogaṃ ca sūtasya prasādataḥ|
valpilitanāśaṃ ca tathā kāmaṃ yathā kālasya taṃ vanam|
yathā lohe tathā dehe kramate nātra saṃśayaḥ|
sādhu sādhu mahāsādhu nnarud bhakt{}yā maddattayā|
tuṣṭaḥ tvaṃ yadi māṃ devi! dṛṣṭā.aṣṭādvādaśavarṣakaḥ|
satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ aho! vācā tridhā kṛtā|
yatkiṃcit prārthaye siddha, tatsarvaṃ pradadāmi te|
kuru kāryaṃ yathā tavyaṃ tiṣṭhe.ahaṃ tvatsamīpataḥ|
viddhaṃ sulvāyasaṃ nāgaṃ yajñārthe kāṃcanaṃ kṛtam|
mahāprājñā pravarttavyā ciraṃ bhījaṃ ca kārayet|
ādau tāvad rasaṃ grāhyaṃ viśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ dṛRham|
dravye rasāyena yogyaṃ tataḥ karma samārambhet|
sumṛṣṭaṃ pānitaṃ sūtaṃ sarvadoṣod{}bhiḥ taṃ tataḥ|
samena gaṃdhakaṃ dadyāt agnisomaṃ na nirdahet|
tīkṣṇaṃ sutvaṃ sunāgaṃ ca samāvarttaṃ ca kārayet|
yatra deśe samutpannā bhūtale vādya parvate|
samaye tatra nirdiṣṭā yeneyaṃ saphalā bhavet|
maṃtraṃ yenedaṃ khanate brahma yenedaṃ khanate hariḥ|
sādhayitvā tu me kāryaṃ paścātsarge gamiṣyasi|
dadhā? sā madhukāṣṭhena yāvadrasma na gacchati|
kāṃcanaṃ jāyate sūta agniṃ dattvā muhurmuhuḥ|
tataḥ śuddhaṃ vijānīyāt vedvaṃ? sulvasya dāpayet|
evaṃ jñātvā prayatnena kuru karma vicakṣaṇaḥ|
jīrṇe jīrṇe vadārtavyaṃ ajīrṇe nava dāpayet|
sarvameva vidhānena pakvaṃ vai ṣoḍaśaiḥ puṭaiḥ|
sdiddhaṃ taṃ vijānīyāt vidhāyate paṃcaśateṣu vā|
kuru karma yathā nyāyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati tad rasam|
śarīreṇaiva tat sarvaṃ bhavati niḥ phalam|
kathayāmi na saṃdeho mārttaṇḍa yena yat kṛtam|
suragaja iva loke śrānta daṃtāsu nityam|
āliṃgena ca vaktavye sparśane ca suśobhaje|
udaṃbaraṃ ca citraṃ ca prasuptaṃ ca jalodare|
dutaṃ yugaṃ mukhe yasya guṇāya samudāhṛtam|
hutāni mukhamadhye tu teṣu vakṣyāmi ye guṇāḥ|
nāsau ch?iṃdate śastrai?va pāvakena na dahyate|
trailodhye ca manohārī kāmadeva iva sthitaḥ|
innayā jāyate tasya sadṛśo jāyate nnayā
gatāndriyāṇi nā nayano nagā grasto jitendriyaḥ|
punaranyaṃ bhavet piṇḍaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā|
koṭivedhī mahārasaḥ gṛhyā piṃḍaṃ koṣṭasu saṃyutam|
ekaikasya tu madhyasthaṃ guṭikāṃ kārayed budhaḥ|
guṭikā- paṃcamākhyā tāḥ ṣaṣṭaṃ jīvaṃ ca kevalam|
dhamanaṃ tatra kurvīta caturdikṣu śanaiḥ śanaiḥ||
sutaptaṃ ca vijānīyāt sṛṣṭibhū nirdhūmaṃ ca yathā bhavet|
namaskṛtya guruṃ devaṃ ātmānaṃ tatra nikṣipet|
bhramaṃ ta hemasaṃkāśaṃ jīvatvaṃ tatra dāpayet|
attiṣṭhati na saṃdeho pūrvāhena? bhāskaro yathā|
saptasiddheṣu ye siddhā vimānaṃ preṣayaṃti te|
bhūtakālāṃtakaṃ baṃdhaṃ yadā karttuṃ na śakyate|
yavena viṃdhate tāraṃ nāgaṃ sulvāyasaṃ sitam|
sa ca tasya dine grāhyaṃ taccūrṇāṃ?ta na bhāvayet|
tasya mūlaṃ phalaṃ grāhyaṃ nakṣatre yamadau vate|
rave varatvaṃ prayacchanti yatra devo maheśvaraḥ|
sāhasraṃ duḥś?caraṃ ghoraṃ ad{}bhutaṃ ca kṛtaṃ mayā|
sādhu sādhu mahāprājña mama śukrasya sādhakaḥ|
bhukt{}vā ca vipulān bhogān kalpaṃti muktibhājanaḥ|
iti śrīnāgārjunaviracite mahārara uktāṣecara baṃdha samāptaḥ|
rase vīrye vipāke ca śuddhaṃ tadviṃdusūtakam|
khoṭaṃ padaṃ jalūkā ca bhasmaṃ caiva caturthakam|
ārdratvaṃ ca ghanatvaṃ ca ghanatvaṃ ca vāyapyaṃ kuru|
lakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate yasya mūrcchitaṃ taṃ vadanti hi|
kṛṣṇaṃ śvetaṃ tathā pītaṃ nīlaṃ vā bhasma sannibham|
nānāvarṇaṃ tathā svinnaṃ ghṛtaṃ yo.agnau jalūkavat|
snigdhaṃ mṛduṃ caiva śikhinā drāvito dravet|
ṣoṭādayeṣ?u ye paṃca vihāya jalūkā kṛtiḥ|
hatāgnau dhāmitaṃ tiṣṭhet na tiṣṭhedeka mūrcchitaḥ|
enaṃ kramaṃ tu yo vetti tasya siddhiḥ na saṃśayaḥ|
krāmaṇena vinā sūto na krametvaivaṃ viṃdhati|
dehalohāmayān sarvān vṛthā syāt kevalaṃ śramaḥ|
yasya yogasya yo yogastenaiva saha yojayet|
taṃ viditvā ca dhātunāṃ pāraṃpartho svadeśataḥ|
ka iva haririva yathā haristathā haraḥ|
kiṃ bhūto hariḥ pīto aṃbaro yasyāsau pītāmbaraḥ|
balināmānaṃ daityaṃ nāgānāṃ paṃcanāṃ paṃcanāgānāṃ hastīnāṃ kṣaya iti nāgakṣayaḥ|
vidalitaṃ bhavasya saṃsārasya dainyaṃ yena asau vidalita-
aparapakṣe pītaṃ abhrakaṃ aṃbaraṃ yena asau pītāṃbaraḥ|
balirgaṃdhaḥ jitaṃ grastaṃ yena asau balijit|
athavā bali liptādin jayati taṃ vā nāgaṃ sisakaṃ kṣayaṃ nayatīti nāgakṣayaḥ|
vahalān gagān garuḍasya hāṭakasya athavā mākṣikasya
vidalitadaityaṃ daridraṃ yenāsau bhavasaṃsārasya duḥkhaṃ hataṃ yenā.asau rasendraṃ jayatu|
deśe deśe nānā ūṣadhānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ca pṛthak kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā pāraṃpartheṇa rasendramaṃgalagraṃthasya vyākhyānaṃ karomi|
lokeśaḥ khecaro dīvyaḥ saubhāgyaṃ paramo mataḥ|
garvajaḥ pāradaḥ girasajaṃ mūkaṃ hasta iti|
pārāvāraṃ saṃmāsamudraṃ yo vai na jānāti rasendramaṃgale
śilāṃ kaṃ matāṃ ca sā dvidhā|
i?ṣṭikā caturthāṃśaṃ ṭipparikā cūrṇalohakā dṛmaṣṭāṃśaṃ kupikācūrṇaṃ
ṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ dattaracūrṇaṃ aṣṭāṃśaṃ udakena saha saṃ kaṃḍayitvā kriyate sā
tasyā bhedaḥ gostanā aṃdhamūkhā nalikā mūṣā
sā pakva--mūkhā daṭamūkhā kṣāramūṣā saiṃ?dhavādilavaṇa- mūkhā kokilākhyamūkhā hematāratāmralohapatra pusirākamukhādayaḥ|
pānatrayaṃ ūrdhvapātanayaṃtraṃ niyāmaka--yaṃtraṃ ḍamaruyaṃtraṃ cakratrayaṃ cākīyaṃtraṃ bālukāyaṃtraṃ tulāyaṃtraṃ kanvapayaṃtraṃ agniṣomāyaṃtraṃ kāṃsabhājanaṃ yaṃtraṃ ghāṇayaṃtraṃ|
śilopari śilā deyā śilā--yaṃtraṃ pīṭhoparipātaṃ madhye rasādaya- pāṭhaṃ yaṃtraṃ pāṣāṇayaṃtraṃ tāmrabhājanaṃ bhūmyāṃ nikṣipya tasyopari rasādayaḥ|
ghoṭodbhavaḥ agastikadalīraṃbhāśṛṃgī uttaravāruṇī karīraṃ kīrakṣīra- kaṃdam|
cūkī vārā nivulaḥ sīra enamadhunā trisaṃdhātai
gaṃdhakaṃ rasaṃ samānena ka jalūkāṃ kṛtvā|
alāṃ haritālaṃ tālakaṃ samāṃśena mūkhāyaṃtreṇa bhasmaṃ kṛtvā miśrayedityarthaḥ|
sulvaputrāṇi samasūtakena lepayitvā kāṃjikena tato dhṛtya gaṃdhakasamacūrṇena saha dhāradharakrameṇa dattvā haṃdikāyaṃtreṇa mārayitvā miśrayaet?yartaḥ|
sūtaṃ rasagaṃdhakaṃ samena kajjalī kṛtvā melayet|
atha jaredhanaṃ kāsaṃ rasasya caturthāṃśena vārayaṃtreṇa vārayitvā samaṃ gaṃdhakena haṃdikāyaṃtreṇa mārayitvā vātajvaraharayoga-- kvāthena tridinaṃ mardayitvā guṭikāṃ baṃdhayedityarthaḥ|
brahmāritikāsā ca samastanakasya vārayitva gaṃdhakena mahaṃdikā- yaṃtreṇa mārayitvā pittajvarakvāthe guṭikā pūrvavat|
tacca sūtakasya caturthāṃśena vārayitvā gaṃdhaka- madhye pācayet|
anena rasabaṃdhena dvandvaṃ jvaraharakvāthe pṛthak madītana--krameṇa sarvadvandvaḥ jvarān hanti|
sūtakasya aṣṭamāṃśena suvarṇaṃ vārayitvā tadabhāve sulvaṃ vā
ṣoḍaśāṃśena tāraṃ rasasya vārayitvā tālakena samaṃ mūkhāyaṃtreṇa mārayitvā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat|
athālīsāreṇa sulvapatrāṇi samarasagaṃdhakaṃ cūrṇayitvā lepayitvā īṣallaghu puṭena kārayet|
tataḥ kāṃcanāra--tvak--rasena tridinaṃ mardayitvā atīsāracikitsokta yogaiḥ krameṇa melayedityarthaḥ|
pāṃḍur?āyasacūrṇakuṭhāracch?innalohatvāt triphalāyā rasena khalve mardayitvā īṣat--gaṃdhakena saha vārayitvā grahaṇīyogena yojayet|

tathāj vāhikāgrahaṇaṃ kramadoṣe pītagaṃdhakapalaṃ rasapaladvandvaṃ kumārīrasena mardayitvā sulvasya patrāṇi kṛtvā amlena prakṣālya pralakena lepayitvā haṃdikāyaṃtreṇa kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ bhasmasūtakaṃ bhavati|
sulvasya piṣṭikā kṛtvā mākṣikadhotama tvaṃ dattvā samena cuk--mardaḥ prayuṃnnāṭaḥ|
tasya rasena tridinaṃ mardayitvā mūkhāyaṃtreṇa khetavarṇaṃ palaṃ sūtaṃ tadvannirguṇḍīrasena saṃmardya bālukā--yaṃtreṇa raktavarṇaṃ bhasma--sūtakaṃ bhavati|
athavā gaṃdhakapalaṃ sūtakasya paladvayaṃ svarṇamākṣika- dhotasatvapalārddhaṃ tusyakap?karṣa pramāṇaṃ ekatra nirguḍīrasena āloḍ{}ya vālukāyaṃtreṇa bhasma--sūtakaṃ raktavarṇaṃ bhasma- sūtakaṃ bhavati|
rasakasattvaṃ rasasamāṃśena vārāhī rasena mūkhāyaṃtreṇa sāmavarṇaṃ bhasma bhavati|
hema abhrakasattvaṃ vā sulvaṃ bījasthāne sarvasthāne prayojayet|

bhasmasūtakayogeṣu? rasaṃ hemasamaṃ kṛtvā tadarddha--gaṃdhakaṃ dattvā dvipadīstrī tasyā puṣpena rajanī--raṃbhārasena ṭaṃkaṇena saha khalve saṃmardya gaḍukayaṃtreṇa baṃdhayitvā tato aṃdhamūkhāyāṃ īṣat gaṃdhakena saha tuṣāgninā puṭet bhasma sūtakaṃ bhavati|
atha gulmeṃ? vāḍīlā kaṃdavatī tadabhāve tadabhāve ubhayaliṃgī rākṣasī kāpikambu bud{}ga--golaṃ vidhavāstrīpuṣpaṃ spaṣṭam|
atha kruṣṭe sulve piṣṭikāṃ kṛtvā gaṃdhakaṃ kaṭutaile prapācya tatra piṣṭikāṃ kṣipet|
samagaṃdhakasūtaṃ vālukā--gaṃḍukā yaṃ?treṇa baṃdhayitvā tataḥ palatrayaṃ gaṃdhaketyādi melayet|

pakamūlānivulaḥ rajanitapapāvāsakaḥ kṣīrajā dugdhikā gokarṇasvāgvoṭamadanamuditā drādravāruṇī vīra girakarṇī harimākṣikaṃ tāpyajaṃ mākṣikaṃ rasagaṃdhakasamena gaḍukayaṃtreṇa baṃdhayitvā ādau tato yoge eṣāṃ kramaṃ|
sarvatra tāpyo dravaṃ mākṣikaṃ śivaśukra ityādi|
gaṃdhakena samaṃ sūtaṃ vārayitvā tu yaṃtreṇa baṃdhayitvā niyojayet|
amaraṃ ab?akaṃ pītāṃbaraṃ rasarājanīkṣṇāri daradaṃ kuṃjaraṃ gaṃdhakaṃ varṣābhū punarnnavārasena nāginyā nā i?ṇi ghananādau taṃḍulāyakaṃ vīra ? satāvarī|

tathā jālena gomūtreṇa luṃgārasena v?ījapūrakarasena śulinīnāla bhūtake śākapika bumṛṣṭi--trayaṃ saurajaṃ kuṣṭaṃ garaṃ viṣaṃ analaṃ citrakaṃ dh?ara kṛṣṇarase suribhagaṃdhakaḥ nāgakaṇī nāḍa kariṇī patrikāpāṣimāṣoṭa sarāsītyarthaḥ|
damayaṃtīkoraṇādreṇa puṣpākuṃcikā dvighnaṃ dviguṇaṃ vyoṣaṃ tri--kaṭukaṃ parājavarttikaṃ nabhaṃ abhrakaṃ i\close bhaṃ sīsakaṃ pavijī vimalendratāravimalāṃ vā guptaṇi guti|
sulvaduti surā- jasasuvarṇaṃ varjamakamavajrī asayaṃ koṣṭaṃ bhasmasūkarṇaṃ tṛtīyam|

dvipadīstrīkākinī ca tasyā rasena puṣpena saṃmardya vyomavallī ākāśavallī alatālaka--samāṃśena samamātrāvaṃgasīsakamityādi ekatramāvart?ya patraṃ kṛtvā rasapādena piṣṭikāṃ kṛtvā staṃbhayitvā dhāmayet|
dvādaśamāni pavi vajraṃ yugapadā strīpuṣpeṇa ravivāllī sūryapravarttakaḥ|
cakrajī mākṣikasattvaṃ ca puṭaṃ gadyāṇa- mātraṃ sulitaṃ pāradaṃ sakriyuktaṃ aṃbakasattvayuktaṃ ratnāri- vajraṃ sitagonasā|
vaikrānta śvetaṃ subaddhaṃ sūtakaṃ hemaṃ raṃjita sūtakaṃ vibhitakādikaṃ saṃbhūtaṃ vibhātako rākṣasā- kharpy?arakāsakaḥ|
ṭaṃkaṇaṃ kṣāraṃ sauvīraṃ suvārāgraha- viṣṭakaṃ grahadhūmaṃ uccaṭā sā goḍe prasiddhā|

ākhogī meṣaśṛṃgī ikṣuraṃ sā khoṭakapuṣpakāsī svarṇapuṣpī g?aṇarājā aṃkāllaṃ nakhī vyāghranakhī vāyasakaṃṭakaḥ pīluvṛkṣakaḥ vāḍusārā mahākālī gusalavallī svayaṃvarā hastagojihv?ā gojihv?ā gobhiḥ vārāni pūrṇādi nāri ādityako bhakti vakrākī vacch?anagā mahāsomasamavallī yajñopakārikā ityarthaḥ|

kājiraṃtitkakaṃ mahārasī mākṣikaṃ rasakaṃ rājaḥ varttaṃ darahaṃ ca candravalī mṛgadūrvā eṇulā ekabiṃb?ā udakabiṃb?ā- kākṣī svarṇapuṣpo lākṣārasaṃ kākāṃḍī ka nā uttā uttāmarasaṃ prathamavayastrī kusumaṃ śamaṭhaṃ hiṃguśrulinī nālikā iti ṣoṭavidhiḥ|
athadunibaṃdhe vajrakaṃdaṃ kṣīrakaṃdaṃ advigirakarṇīkā jāvajīvakamaṣṭaka--vargamadhye ahānāgaphaṇī vyomaṃ ākāśa- vallī pāṣāṇabhedakroṣṭajihvā śṛgālajihvā sadevakaṃ svarṇam|

tapte khalvatale dharaṇayaṃtrepuṭanā trikṣāraiḥ candravatī vāku vā caṃpakakarppūraṃ kāmapippalājal? pippalīkāmaṃ svarṇapuṣpī svinnā sveditaḥ dolāyaṃtreṇa muniḥ agāstiḥ hastipā māṇava--kaṃdaṃ bhṛṃgabhṛṃgarājaṃ mahauṣadhaṃ suḍhiḥ saptaniṣiktaṃ saptavārān tatuṃ sūtakasyāṣṭamajāritaṃ bhānu dvādaśaṃ svaraḥ|
samaji niṣiktaṃ saptavārān saptajinacaturviṃśati--dīnāraṃ svarṇaṃ taccāṣṭamāṃśena jāritam|

rājavṛkṣaḥ kiravāraśaśirekhā vā kuvīṣarakarṇo aśvagaṃdhā surasā tulasīkaṃḍulaṃ sūraṇaṃ svetasūraṇaṃ bhṛṃgarāj?amiti paṃcaviṃśati vārān muniḥ agastiḥ kanakaṃ kṛṣṇa- dhattūrakaṃ nāgā nāgakarṇī sapakṣi vajravallī triradhārā- sthi śṛṃgi--śṛṃkhalā niṃbikā toyanibikā hemarasaṃ unmattaka--rasaṃ ātmāṃguliḥ svaliṃgaṃ kolaṃ svarṇamākṣikaṃ viṣṇumaṃtraṃ narasya retaḥ śukraṃ rudhiraṃ ghra puṣpaṃ śaśikarpūraṃ hemarasaṃ unmattakarasaḥ kh?ecarako iṃdragopaḥ mālatīrasaṃ bhavaḥ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ kāliṃdī phalaṃ sāraṃge goṭakaḥ svarṇaṃ ṣacaṃ abhrakasattvaṃ tīlaṃ tālakaṃ kuliśaṃ vajraṃ lohaṃ sutvaṃ ekatra sūtakena jārayitvā jalasūtakaṃ jalaka--maṃdikā kapigaṃdhamūlā|
atha jāraṇaprakaraṇe daradāt hiṃgulāt pātayitvā rasaṃ grāhyam|
rava--sattvaṃ abhrakasattvaṃ samastasattvāni grāsamānena rasasya dattvā pṛthaggari vargeṇa saha duv?yādhikārekṣuḥ oṣadhāt dattvā svena mardanakrameṇa garbhe dravanti|

pakvaṃ bījaṃ rasa--uparasa--uparasalohasutvasyopari nirvāhayitvā tatsutvaṃ paṃcadaśakasuvarṇebhyaḥ same melayitvā gaṃdhaka daradatulpake saṃmāṃśena cūrṇena vāpaṃ pratidattvā svarṇasyopari prāka sutvapaṭuṇaṃ uttārayedityarthaḥ|
śubhanakaṃ pakvabījaṃ surabhigaṃdhakaṃ śaśitāraṃ dravaprakaraṇaṃ samāptam|

paṃcapaṃcamṛttikā paṭulavarṇāni rasakaṃ kharpākhāraviditaṃ dvādaśaṃ dinaṃ ruramaṃ nāgaṃ garuḍaṃ svarṇaṃ aruṇaṃ tāmraṃ āraritī kiṃ jihnaṃ lohaṃ aṣṭakāṃ saṃkulilaṃ baṃgaṃ aṃbujaṃ uḍunāmakaraṃjavamiśraṃ bhūmilatāmidaṃ yā brahmadaṃ bh?īvāmi āsvuyākhu karṇābhekā maṃdakabrāhmī muṃkhai śarapuṃkhā kiṃ cakraḥ|
agnisomena agniṣomayaṃtrena ūṣmayaṃtraṃ gokarṇīsāṣoṭakaḥ kṛṣṇamaṃjarī kṛṣṇaviḍālīva
brahmapuṣpaṃ vagakulaṃ kāśmirasya kuṃsuṃbhasya uparatnāni uparasāni bhūmi śailodrabhavaṃ bhūmilatā sattvām|
śilāmākṣikaṃ sattvaṃ naktakusumaṃ karajaṃ puṣpaṃ svamāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ baddhasūte melāpayedityarthaḥ|

tasya saṃsargenotpannaṃ puruṣavīryaṃ tasya sutasya tatkṣaṇo- tpannasya viṣṭākākinā mūtragrahita snehaṃ golakasūtakaṃ ca| ādau godhanaṃ tato rasāyanaṃ sacetagodhanaṃ yathākālama- kuṇakiṃciṇikā--pakvaṃ pippalīcūrṇaṃ savajripayaḥ yuktaṃ bhakṣitamātraṃ malatr?uṭimātraṃ pātayatā hasemāmayadoṣaṃ kuṣṭavacāstavakena ki tīyaṃ kvāthamidaṃ sabiṃḍa gamapūrvap?aḥ pibati tridinaṃ triṣu vāraṃ tasya śudhyati lavaṇāvikāraṃ savinabhasya sudhāsma sipānaṃ kepi taro pibati,
dina sapta naśyati tailavikāraṃ samaghoṣaṃ varmma yamaḥ hayagajapuṣpamayoghaṃ takrayutaṃ laghu kāhalimūlaṃ kopi naraḥ pibati dina saptasavaman bhavaja--kukalī nayayate samudhavapuśca|
narasya sūtakālāṃta ? gaṃdhaṃ dve pṛthivī kanikānāṃ putrāṃga- cūrṇaḥ|
apatasyārudhiratejapuṣpaṃ vāyu tasya tat--kṣaṇotpannasya putraviṣṭā ākāśāṃta--guṣkaṃ ākāśaṃ tasya puṣpakāle puruṣasaṃsargotpannaṃ vīryaṃ grāhyam|
pṛthak koṭivedhe rasena ca mad guṭikā kāryā|
tasya śiraḥ apūrvamalasadhotpanna--putraviṣṭāviv?āne śṛṃge dhānyarāśau sthāpyate|
ajāsane ravaḥ lokapālikā kinīmūlaṃ caraṃ phalaṃ kākaḥ tīvra līlāraktasuhī|
guhāśāliparṇī atiguhyāpitaparṇī gaṃdharva ca hastoparaṃ kaḥ dvipavitrakaṃ kaṭūphalaṃ katakaphalaṃ surā bhaṭorā candrā kṣudramāṃsī rūpākoṣṭaṃ kaliṃgāṃ? indrayavaḥ|
urūkaṃ eraṃḍaṃ sāragheṇa bh?athunā yavasthā gamūcī avaṣṭā paḍhāṃ madhuyaṣṭikā madhusāram|
athātīsāre sūtaṃ prāk yat baddhaṃ tat yojyam|
śleṣārddhakā arddhaśloke naṣṭe dvak pṛthak yoge jñātavya|
kṛtvā gaḍukayaṃtreṇa mārayitvā tato yoge yā jayet|
māḍuradviguṇaṃ kṛtvā māṃḍukaṃ tataḥ sāralohaṃ dviguṇaphalapradaṃ tasyāt sthūlaṃ sāralohaṃ aṣṭaguṇaphalapradam|
tasmādraudraṃ paḍālagātrākhyaṃ ṣoḍaśaguṇaphalapradaṃ vajrakalo dviguṇaphalapradaṃ tataṃ? surāyasaṃ sulvaṃ svarṇavajarikaṃ aṣṭaguṇaphalapradam|
tasmāt bhadrakalohaṃ pratimāliṃgayā garalaṃ sthitalohaṃ sahasraguṇaphalapradam|
tato vajraṃ yasya prakāreṇa lohā dayati tadvajraṃ tansahasraṣaṣṭiguṇaphalapradam|
tataḥ pa?ṇ?yadrāvakāsmatsaṃbhūtaṃ sa tathā lakṣaguṇaphala ? pradam|
tasmānniraṃdhraṃ korghaḥ kāṭh?akalohaṃ daśalakṣa- phalapradam tato vada ko.arthaḥ|
koṭiguṇaṃ kāṃtaṃ kāṃtalohaṃ tataḥ kuligaṃ ko.arthaḥ ? vajrābhavakāṃtamiśrayonisaṃbhūtaṃ tat svarge.apyasti|
sapta ṛtu saptavārān vāgerī gaṃgeruko kuṭhāracchinnākaḥ pāṃḍuraphaliyāśāl?i bibākhyalohanigh?naṃ lohahā ityarthaḥ garttāṃkaliṃbukaṃ bhumitikākā boḍadharaḥ|
lohāṃkuśo loha--nihnakaḥ māriṣo māṇavakaṃda asti karṇamityarthaḥ|
śigukaṃ trīṇi bhāgāni madhusuribhaṭorāśijājatu--tathā makṣisārdhaṃ gomūtreṇa athavā paśumūtreṇa prācyaṃ vikvaṇakaṃ bhavati|
karppadena vastreṇa suradār?u? ityādi utpalaṃ koṣṭam| bhūtamāṃsīkamilākṣāsarjarasaḥ śālā ādhanarmme sūryakāṃti svetagorāśmani maṇidāpakuṃ dutināṃ putinā|
grahagodhāśvetallī visaṃbharo iti rasendramaṃgale dvipaṇakaṃ samāptam|
paraṃ vā lohe lohaṃ na yoktavyaṃ deho mṛduḥ sthiraśca
tatra kālena yāvatā yāvad guṇaḥ kumārasya yutaḥ syādviguṇena saḥ|
nirāvaṃ daśadhā proktaṃ kāṃtaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ tataḥ|
evaṃ kṛte asya lohasya giradoṣaḥ praśāmyati|
tarasthaṃ lohaṃ iti prati samuccayaprayogena bhave dīpatkarī dutiḥ|
loohāṃ kuśena triphalā kvāthā tapte vinikṣipet| laye
dvāmāritaṃ sūtena kutadhā mākṣikena vā vilipya dravitaṃ loham|
mṛdvagninā mudritaṃ kṛtvā puṭayed bhūmigarttagataṃ kuryānnivātasthaṃ sarvataḥ ṣoḍaśāṃ gulam|
atho.asmin loha- pātrasthe tāpyaṃ tavamita hiṃguka--triphalābhognināsthālpaṃ śoṣayed vighaṭite|
peṣaṇaṃ cā vidhātavyaṃ paunaḥ punyena paṃdritaiḥ|
